statements: SELECT * FROM gene_expression_analysis;
SELECT gene_id, gene_name FROM gene_expression_analysis WHERE expression_level > 10;
SELECT * FROM gene_expression_analysis WHERE expression_level < 5 ORDER BY gene_id DESC;
SELECT gene_name, expression_level FROM gene_expression_analysis WHERE gene_id = 3;
SELECT gene_id, gene_name, expression_level FROM gene_expression_analysis WHERE gene_name LIKE '%A%'
SELECT gene_id, gene_name, expression_level FROM gene_expression_analysis WHERE expression_level > 50 ORDER BY gene_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM gene_expression_analysis WHERE gene_name LIKE 'A%' AND expression_level BETWEEN 20 AND 100 ORDER BY expression_level DESC;
SELECT gene_id, gene_name FROM gene_expression_analysis WHERE expression_level < 30 OR gene_name = 'BRCA1';
SELECT gene_name FROM gene_expression_analysis ORDER BY gene_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_genes, AVG(expression_level) AS average_expression FROM gene_expression_analysis;
SELECT * FROM gene_expression_analysis;
SELECT gene_name, expression_level FROM gene_expression_analysis WHERE gene_id = 'dd812da4-32de-4f0e-bb7f-20a0981c8d29';
SELECT gene_name, expression_level FROM gene_expression_analysis ORDER BY expression_level DESC;
SELECT gene_name, expression_level FROM gene_expression_analysis WHERE gene_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT gene_id, gene_name, expression_level, significance_level FROM gene_expression_analysis;
SELECT gene_name, expression_level FROM gene_expression_analysis WHERE expression_level > 5 ORDER BY expression_level DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT gene_name, expression_level, significance_level FROM gene_expression_analysis WHERE expression_level BETWEEN 3 AND 7 AND significance_level > 0.05 ORDER BY gene_name ASC;

SELECT gene_name, fold_change FROM gene_expression_analysis JOIN differential_expression ON gene_expression_analysis.gene_id = differential_expression.gene_id WHERE condition = 'healthy' ORDER BY fold_change DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT gene_name, expression_level, fold_change FROM gene_expression_analysis JOIN differential_expression ON gene_expression_analysis.gene_id = differential_expression.gene_id WHERE fold_change < -2 OR fold_change > 2 ORDER BY gene_name ASC;

SELECT * FROM gene_expression_analysis JOIN differential_expression ON gene_expression_analysis.gene_id = differential_expression.gene_id WHERE condition = 'cancer' ORDER BY expression_level DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT gene_id, gene_name, expression_level FROM genes;
SELECT sample_id, sample_name, study_id FROM samples;
SELECT de_id, gene_id, sample_id, fold_change, p_value FROM differential_expression;
SELECT * FROM genes ORDER BY gene_name ASC;
SELECT gene_id, gene_name, expression_level FROM genes WHERE expression_level > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM genes WHERE expression_level > 10 ORDER BY gene_name DESC
SELECT gene_name, expression_level FROM genes WHERE expression_level BETWEEN 5 AND 15 ORDER BY expression_level DESC
SELECT * FROM samples WHERE sample_name LIKE '%control%' AND study_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT genes.gene_name, differential_expression.fold_change FROM genes JOIN differential_expression ON genes.gene_id = differential_expression.gene_id WHERE fold_change > 2 ORDER BY fold_change DESC

SELECT samples.sample_name, differential_expression.p_value FROM samples JOIN differential_expression ON samples.sample_id = differential_expression.sample_id WHERE p_value < 0.05 ORDER BY p_value ASC
SELECT * FROM GeneExpressionData;
SELECT gene_name, expression_level FROM GeneExpressionData WHERE expression_level > 10;
SELECT gene_name, expression_level FROM GeneExpressionData ORDER BY expression_level DESC;
SELECT sample_name, tissue_type, date_collected FROM SampleData WHERE tissue_type = 'Liver';
SELECT experiment_name, research_type FROM ExperimentData WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT gene_name, expression_level FROM GeneExpressionData WHERE gene_id = 1;
SELECT sample_name, tissue_type FROM SampleData WHERE date_collected > '2022-01-01';
SELECT experiment_name, research_type FROM ExperimentData ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT gene_id, fold_change, p_value FROM DifferentiallyExpressedGenes WHERE p_value < 0.05;
SELECT sample_name, tissue_type FROM SampleData WHERE sample_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT gene_id, expression_value FROM GeneExpressionData;
SELECT sample_id, expression_value FROM GeneExpressionData ORDER BY sample_id;
SELECT * FROM GeneExpressionData WHERE expression_value > 0.5;
SELECT gene_id, expression_value FROM GeneExpressionData WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT sample_id, timestamp FROM GeneExpressionData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT gene_id, expression_value FROM GeneExpressionData WHERE expression_value > 10 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT gene_id, AVG(expression_value) AS avg_expression FROM GeneExpressionData GROUP BY gene_id HAVING count(gene_id) > 1 ORDER BY avg_expression DESC
SELECT * FROM GeneExpressionData WHERE sample_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001'
SELECT gene_id, MAX(expression_value) AS max_expression FROM GeneExpressionData GROUP BY gene_id ORDER BY max_expression DESC LIMIT 3

SELECT gene_id, MIN(expression_value) AS min_expression, MAX(expression_value) AS max_expression FROM GeneExpressionData WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' GROUP BY gene_id HAVING max_expression - min_expression > 5
